long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FootballStars wallet is an extension that allows you to view your balances of basic tokens on all main chains - Ethereum, BSC and Matic. Also you can add any other chains or tokes you are willing to. 

FootballStars wallet is giving you the possibility of sending all your basic and custom tokens on all chains.

Also it should be mentioned that FootballStars wallet is requiring permission to the notification, so you can receive them when transaction is done or if something went wrong.
